description:
This month, we're discussing "The Lazarus Project" by Aleksandar Hemon (Bosnia-Herzegovina).


To order the book, click here.

Read the book in advance.

Our discussion will revolve around 2 elements, namely story (plot & character development) and style (writing style & length). We also invite you to view the story from a different perspective: step out of your shoes (and how you usually see the world) and step into the shoes of one or other of the characters. If you manage to do this (and it's not always easy), you will get much more out of any book you read.

Condition: To attend the discussion, you must have read AND finished the book!

Book Club schedule:
 Doors open: 19:15
Starts: 19:30
Ends: 21:00
name: Book Club discussion: "The Lazarus Project" by Aleksandar Hemon
